Items.Title: Resolution recognizing March 5th as “Three-Fifths Clause Awareness Day” to be officially observed each year in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing March 5th as “Three-Fifths Clause Awareness Day” to be officially observed each year in NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Congress to add an amendment to the Constitution of the United States directly negating the language of Article 1, Section two, Paragraph 3, known as the “three-fifths clause”.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to add an amendment to the Constitution directly negating the language of Article 1, Section two, Paragraph 3, known as the “three-fifths clause”.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing March 5th as “Three-Fifths Clause Awareness Day” to be officially observed each year in New York City.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Recognizing March 5th as “Three-Fifths Clause Awareness Day” to be officially observed each year in NYC.
